comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET4.0C; .NET4.0E; MS-RTC LM 8; InfoPath.1)

Steps to reproduce:

Set the Vaue of Browser.startup.homepage override.mstone to Ignore via a Group Policy and also tried Prefs.js as locked - this is the same as Bug Report 352063 - seems to have re-appeared or been Deprecated although not Stated anywhere.


Actual results:

First Run in one Tab and then Get Specified Home Page in Second Tab.


Expected results:

Specified Home Page in First Tab.
